definition: to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The potential flow theory is then applied to the overlap of the slipstream and the flow over the wing.
sentences.chinese: 用位流理論來處理螺旋槳滑流與機翼繞流的迭加。

sentences.english: So we fixed some factors which affect detouring flow.
sentences.chinese: 通過相關的實驗，確定了影響繞流的一些因素。

sentences.english: The flow mechanism near groin-like structures is analyzed and a two-dimensional model is established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了丁壩繞流機理，建立了二維流動模式。

sentences.english: The physical factor fields and the behavial law of mesoscale geographical convergence over the northeast of Qinghai-Xizang Plateau are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原東北側存在着中尺度地形繞流輻合現象。

sentences.english: No endplate of reasonable size will prevent tip flow.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個合適的端板尺寸將會阻止翼根繞流。

sentences.english: Some generic features of submarine hydrodynamics with free surface are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中也探討了潛艇自由液麪繞流的一般特性。
